title: The Sinner's Daughter
description: Abducted on the night of her brother's coronation, The Princess Tamryn and her brother Darius are taken far from their home, across the oceans to the enemy country of Orvaen. There, they find a people and a culture similar to their own - and a Queen who despises them, and wishes both Tamryn and Darius humiliated and destroyed. But when Tamryn bargains with her Gods for her brother's freedom, their actions leave her cut off and adrift from everything she has known before.Having to put her trust in the enemy for survival, Tamryn embarks on a dangerous journey through a land with it own Gods, peoples and prophecy. As Orvaen threatens to tear itself apart in civil war and a Sinnotian fleet sails to rescue their Princess, Tamryn faces her own struggle; torn between the path laid before her, her wish to return to her home, and the path her heart desires...
author: Gillian O'Rourke
